TREND & FAYRE

PORTFOLIO

Consulting

If you are feeling a little stuck in a rut with the design of your place, a consultation maybe exactly what you need.

I can help you out. Be it by simply bouncing around some fresh ideas or choosing paint colours and discussing furniture ideas and placement.

If you need further help, I can accompany you on shopping trips and be on call throughout the endless decision making process involved in creating a unique and personal home.
